glosses: alternative form of elbette (“of course, surely”)

examples.text: "İyi bilirdik" derler, elbet ardımdan / Bundan büyük bi' yalan yok
examples.translation: Of course they will say "we knew him well" after I am gone / There is no lie bigger than this

examples.text: Gün gelir elbet yine güleriz / Baktık olmadı çay içeriz
examples.translation: The day will surely come when we laugh again / If it doesn't happen, we will have tea

etymology: See elbette. Compare Armenian հալբաթ (halbatʻ), Georgian ალბათ (albat), and Bengali আলবৎ (albot), which also show the short form.
